_header: A sufficient salve for each disease
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 41.
_description: The Virtue of Pacience — one cross-rhymed quatrain

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
A sufficyent salve for eche diseaseThe cheff revenge for cruell
                    yreys patyence then present easefor to delaye the fro flamy
                    fyre
